name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

affiliation: Seven Warlords of the Sea (through Moria)

keyMoments.title: Oars Revealed as Ultimate Weapon
keyMoments.description: Moria unveils Oars to his key subordinates, revealing the culmination of their zombie army project and his plan to gain power in the New World.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full scope of the Thriller Bark Pirates' capabilities and Moria's ambitions.

keyMoments.title: Thriller Bark Leaders' Dreams Revealed
keyMoments.description: Moria, Absalom, and Perona discuss their individual dreams and how Oars' resurrection will help them achieve their goals.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the motivations and ambitions of the Thriller Bark Pirates' leadership.

keyMoments.title: Oars Joins as Special Zombie #900
keyMoments.description: Oars is successfully resurrected with Luffy's shadow and becomes the most powerful member of Moria's zombie army.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the completion of Moria's ultimate zombie project and adds the strongest fighter to the crew.

description: A pirate crew led by Gecko Moria, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, specializing in creating and commanding an army of zombies. Based on the massive ship Thriller Bark in the Florian Triangle.
goals: Become King of the Pirates using zombie army
Get revenge on Kaido for past defeat
Dominate the New World with undead forces

keyMoments.title: Nami, Usopp, and Chopper Witness Oars' Revival
keyMoments.description: Three Straw Hat members witness the resurrection of Oars and realize the magnitude of the threat facing their crew.
keyMoments.significance: The crew becomes aware of Moria's ultimate weapon and the danger it poses, especially since it contains their captain's shadow.

keyMoments.title: Brook Shares Zombie Weakness with Crew
keyMoments.description: Brook reveals to Franky and Robin that salt can purify zombies, providing crucial tactical information for fighting Moria's forces.
keyMoments.significance: Gives the Straw Hats a key advantage in understanding how to defeat the zombie army.

description: A pirate crew led by Monkey D. Luffy with the goal of finding the One Piece treasure. Currently fighting against Gecko Moria's zombie army on Thriller Bark to rescue their captured shadows.
goals: Rescue Luffy and other crew members' shadows
Defeat Gecko Moria and his zombie army
